column1: Also, consider how behaviours (including compliance with social distancing) might change if a large proportion of the population are told they are 'negative' for coronavirus (as opposed to not having virus detected at that point in time)

Also, consider how behaviours (including compliance with social distancing) might change if a large proportion of the population are told they are 'negative' for coronavirus (as opposed to not having virus detected at that point in time)
